title: Solidarity with Immigrants Bike Ride
description: Join us for a family-paced and no-drop bike ride in solidarity with immigrants. All bikes are welcome for a 6-8 mile ride.
raw_text:
SOLIDARITY WITH IMMIGRANTS BIKE RIDE
SUN JULY 27
All Bikes Welcomed | 6-8 miles
Family Paced & No Drop Bike Ride

Colonel Summers Park
Meet up at 1:30 PM
Ride out at 2 PM

@solidaritycyclingcrew

Donate to Portland Immigrant Rights Coalition
Donate to Soar Immigration Legal Services
raw_summary: The image promotes the "Solidarity with Immigrants Bike Ride" taking place on Sunday, July 27 at Colonel Summers Park. The event welcomes all bikes for a 6-8 mile family-paced and no-drop bike ride. Meetup is at 1:30 PM, and the ride begins at 2 PM. The flyer encourages donations to the Portland Immigrant Rights Coalition and Soar Immigration Legal Services. An Instagram handle @solidaritycyclingcrew is mentioned for more information.

title: Olympia Visibility Brigade
description: We deploy each weekend on overpasses in the Olympia-Tumwater-Lacey area, on Mondays during evening rush hour, and support Capitol protests when possible. Bring your high-viz protest signs, flags, fun costumes, and a good mood.
meeting_location: Eastside St. SE over I-5, Olympia
raw_text:
Impatient for the next big protest? Us too! Join us weekly to make good trouble!

OLYMPIA VISIBILITY BRIGADE

We deploy each weekend on overpasses in the Olympia-Tumwater-Lacey area
We also deploy on Mondays during evening rush hour
We support Capitol protests when possible

Bring your high-viz protest signs, flags, fun costumes, a good mood, and be tolerant of terrible dancing. Introverts welcome!

Upcoming Event:
Monday, July 28th @ 4:30 - 6:30 pm
Eastside St. SE over I-5, Olympia

DEMOCRACY IS UNDER ATTACK
STAND UP FIGHT BACK!

Look for upcoming Olympia Visibility Brigade events at thelop.org and backbonecampaign.org
raw_summary: The image details a protest event organized by the Olympia Visibility Brigade, featuring a call to join weekly activities. It specifies a particular date, time, and location for an upcoming event.

title: Honk for the Constitution
description: Join us to express support for constitutional principles; bring flags, signs, and a non-violent attitude at the traffic light near Burger King in Zillah. Participate by briefly stopping by or showing support from your vehicle.
address: 1st Ave, Vintage Valley Parkway, in front of Burger King
meeting_location: Traffic light at 1st Ave and Vintage Valley Parkway, in front of Burger King
raw_text:
Zillah, 8-2-2025
1st Ave, Vintage Valley Parkway, the traffic light
NO KINGS! in front of Burger King, small humor
Bring flags, signs, and a dedication to non violence, join us for ten minutes or just drive by and honk, roll down your window and offer encouragement, all actions are good actions!

title: Protest Against Trump's Attacks on Native Tribes
description: We invite you to a peaceful permitted protest at the sidewalk by Tivoli Fountain. Remember to bring water, sunscreen, and protest signs. Limited amenities and signs will be available.
raw_text:
PROTEST!
TRUMP’S ATTACKS ON NATIVE TRIBES
COME JOIN US FOR A PEACEFUL PERMITTED PROTEST AT THE SIDEWALK BY TIVOLI FOUNTAIN!
DON’T FORGET TO BRING WATER, SUNSCREEN AND PROTEST SIGNS!
LIMITED AMENITIES AND SIGNS WILL BE AVAILABLE AT THE TABLE.

WHEN: SATURDAY 8/9, 12-2PM
WHERE: WA STATE CAPITOL BLDG.
UN International Day of Indigenous Peoples, 8/9/2025

Oly Resistors
SPEAK UP FOR THE RIGHTS OF INDIGENOUS COMMUNITIES!
raw_summary: A protest organized against former President Trump's attacks on Native Tribes. It will be held on Saturday, August 9, 2025, from 12 PM to 2 PM at the Washington State Capitol Building. The event coincides with the UN International Day of Indigenous Peoples and includes a peaceful permitted protest with amenities provided. Organized by Oly Resistors.
